section.title:
sales
creating new Sale
section.para: To create a new sale, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:

note.para: Sales make pricing schedules available to all customers for the period of time defined by the sale.

section.para: When creating a new sale, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the name of the sale.
Enter a description to identify the sale.
Specify a pricing schedule to assign to the sale. By assigning a pricing schedule to a sale, you make the prices on the pricing schedule available to all customers for the period defined by the sale.
Enter the date when the sale begins.
Enter the date when the sale ends.
